description: Detects artefacts associated with activity group GALLIUM - Microsoft Threat Intelligence Center indicators released in December 2019.
author: Tim Burrell
name: GALLIUM Artefacts - Builtin
query: (winlog.event_id:"257" AND QNAME:("asyspy256.ddns.net" OR "hotkillmail9sddcc.ddns.net" OR "rosaf112.ddns.net" OR "cvdfhjh1231.myftp.biz" OR "sz2016rose.ddns.net" OR "dffwescwer4325.myftp.biz" OR "cvdfhjh1231.ddns.net"))
